programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan helps fight off a raid by the Sultan’s men, but is captured when Lang betrays him. Marianne, back in civilized life and courted by Brooke, struggles with doubts about what Sandokan told her, breaking down as the Sultan parades the tortured pirate in Labuan and she realises her father’s guilt as a war criminal. Meanwhile, the Sultan exposes Brooke’s biracial identity, disgracing him. Determined to redeem himself, Brooke proposes a mysterious plan to Marianne. Soon after, Sandokan is found dead in his cell.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan survives a fake poison, part of Brooke’s pact with Marianne: her hand for Sandokan’s freedom. Brooke hopes Sandokan will overthrow the Sultan, leaving room for him. Indeed, Sandokan returns to the jungle, leading the Dayaks’ to free the slaves. Brooke strikes a deal with Guillonk to suppress the revolt in exchange for becoming Rajah. When Marianne learns of this, she escapes and warns Sandokan. The Sultan is killed, Brooke rules Sarawak, but the Dayaks are free. Marianne and Sandokan begin a new life as revolutionaries on the hidden island of Mompracem.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor S8
programme.desc: A friendly retired couple delights a family with young children when they move in next door. Then the new neighbours' dog attacks the children's mother, setting off a conflict that ends in two murders.

programme.title: The Titan Games S1
programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by Dwayne Johnson. Winners will advance to the ultimate challenge of Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. The male and female competitors who conquer Mt. Olympus will become a Titan, and in the end, the Titans return to battle each other. One woman and one man will be crowned Titan Champions. Dwayne Johnson serves as host and Executive Producer, Liam McHugh and Alex Mendez commentate from the skybox and Cari Champion reports from inside the arena.

programme.title: A Score To Settle
programme.desc: An ex-enforcer for a local crime syndicate has vowed to enact retribution on his mob bosses after 19 years of wrongful imprisonment.

programme.title: Kill Chain
programme.desc: A deadly shootout between two hitmen erupts into an evening of murder, betrayal and revenge amongst a gang of crooked police, assassins and mercenaries.

programme.title: 3 Am Part 3
programme.desc: Three different short movies revolving around a similar theme: a sinister presence when the clock strikes 3.00 am.

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: A fishing boat captain's peaceful life shattered as his ex-wife begs for his help- asking him to kill her abusive husband.

programme.title: Pele
programme.desc: Biographical drama of Pele's meteoric rise from the slum of Sao Paulo to leading Brazil to its first world cup victory at the age of 17

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: A woman wakes up from an accident having lost her memory. She begins to have disturbing visions starting a desperate fight to uncover the truth about her past.

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

programme.title: Tiger On Beat
programme.desc: A drug dealer joins forces with two mismatched cops to crack a band of heroin dealers.

programme.title: The Policeman's Lineage
programme.desc: A criminal drama of the very different two policemen handling a huge case together shakes the police organization.

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on the run with a group of unlikely companions.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: In a frenzy of mezcal and spice, Mena devours a host of local delicacies: plant-based seafood, agua chile and classic enfrijoladas. Later, Mena joins a local abuela to make traditional moles.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Texas is a vegan oasis; Mena explores the off-beat Texan Capitol's surprising plant-based bounty: fried chicken, larger-than-life biscuits, short rib baos and mouth-watering vegan brisket.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Mena returns to his home town and makes vegan ice cream with musician Tesher, then swings home to get a taste of his mum's Egyptian cooking.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Ben’s food journey starts in the West Coast of the South Island. He meets the only NZ cranberry producer at a farm in Hokitika and travels to Blackball to learn how chorizo is made. He cooks a range of dishes at the beach incorporating these local delicacies, matched with a local beer.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Ben visits High Peak Station in Canterbury and learns of their high -country farm to fork experience and tales of multigenerational stewardship. On the wild Tora Coast he meets a couple who harvest kaimoana sustainably – launching their fishing boat into the sea using a bulldozer.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Ben’s travels to Hastings and discovers a holistic fully vertically integrated approach to creating grass fed Angus beef. He ventures to the local farmers market and meets amazing local food producers, reinforcing the abundance of produce grown in the region.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Ben’s meets an Orchardist and Food Innovation specialist. They have a shared vision to make all natural varietal – led apple juice, using the best technology in the world. He also checks out over 30 varieties of figs grown in the Mediterranean type climate of Hawkes Bay.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Ben takes a boat to visit a salmon farm in Akaroa and learns the difference between NZ King and Atlantic salmon. He catches salmon and cooks it on the shoreline overlooking the harbour. He checks out a high-quality homegrown culinary oil that’s both healthy and versatile, highlighting a commitment to local agriculture and sustainability.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: It’s stone fruit season! Ben visits a family run orchard in Central Otago known for its long season of stone fruit and a strong connection to the land and community. He discovers an all-electric cherry farm where premium export cherries are sold direct to Kiwis.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Ben experiences the Ruapehu’s region emerging food story and rich history of market gardening. He meets a sixth generation farmer who has turned a remote wilderness into a thriving eco-tourism and fine dining destination, alongside an award winning chef.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Alan explores a luxury train from Edinburgh, meets its chef, visits WWII and Jacobite memorials, strolls Morar’s Silver Sands, and learns about the West Highland Line’s engineering marvels.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Alan enjoys the train's spa, visits Wemyss Bay, tours Mount Stuart on Bute, sees a rare Shakespeare folio, explores crew areas, joins wild adventures, and tours Pitlochry’s famed hilltop theatre.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Alan’s luxury train tour continues with cabin views, Culloden’s history, seal-spotting in Plockton, cattle droving tales, train driving, whisky tasting, eagle spotting, and countryside yoga bliss.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Alan’s rare journey sails to Iona and Staffa, tours Scone Palace and V&A Dundee, reunites with a Broadway friend, savours Oban seafood, and ends with a ceilidh and farewell over the Forth Bridge.

programme.title: Growing Up Grizzly: A Tale Of Two Orphans
programme.desc: The city rich in history and hearty food surprises with elevated live-fire cooking, fresh Capalachi pasta and an unexpected turn on the classic Philly “Cheesesteak”. Mena learns to make delectable donuts with funnyman Maz Jobrani and crushes an absolutely monstrous “meatball” sub.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: Mena visits a city steeped in tradition... and gravy, as he indulges in hearty planted-based Quebecois classics—poutine, smoked “meat” sandwiches, tourtiere, and the famous Montreal bagel.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: Mena feasts with magician and Vegas legend Penn Jillette. He explores the off-strip Sin City vegan food scene, indulging in plant-based “Beef” Wellington, sky-high waffles, and intricate dim sum, then dines with cookbook author Carleigh Bodrug.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: Bathed in sunshine and Big Latin Culture, Mena learns to make classic Cubanos and traditional Puerto Rican mofongo—vegan-style. He cruises the seas with cookbook author Radhi Devlukia, takes actor Matt Murray to South Beach for mouth-watering molten lava cake, and harvests and tastes astonishing exotic fruits.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: In the heart of Japan, Mena devours plant-based sushi and ramen. He learns to cook soba noodles from scratch, home-made mochi, and takes part in a traditional tea ceremony.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: In Saint Lucia, the twins crash Maisie’s getaway for a whirlwind of sailing adventures, jungle hikes, decadent chocolate massages, rum tastings, and endless tropical fun!

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: In Iceland, Bonnie teams up with the twins for an epic escape—whale watching, volcano trekking, horseback riding, and inspiring eco chats under the midnight sun.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: In Dubai, Luke goes all out with adrenaline-packed dives, jetpacking thrills, golf swings, and speedboat races—then shares Potter memories over dinner…the loser picks up the tab!

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: In Poland, Sophie trades a calm weekend for a rush of adventure: trekking the towering Tatras, rafting wild rivers, uncovering a legendary salt mine, and so much more!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.title: Guess with Jess

programme.desc: A bookworm becomes the librarian. Same night a magical spear gets stolen and he's off to get some real life experience around the globe on his quest for the spear - starting with being thrown off a plane over Amazonas by his cute helper.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he’d want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

programme.title: The Librarian: The Return To King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Adventurer Flynn Carsen receives a secret map to King Solomon's Mines. When the map is stolen, Flynn sets out to find the map and the Key of Solomon's book, without which the map is useless anyway.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as tough detective John Kimble in Kindergarten Cop, going undercover as a teacher to find a drug lord's wife. Packed with action, humor, and heart, it’s a classic comedy-thriller.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Matt Damon returns as Jason Bourne in Jason Bourne, with director Paul Greengrass back for another thrilling chapter. Bourne is drawn out of hiding, facing new dangers with Alicia Vikander, Vincent Cassel, and more.

programme.title: Exploding Sun Part 1
programme.desc: A historic space launch triggers a solar-storm event that could have cataclysmic repercussions for the planet if it isn't stopped in time - and time is running out.

programme.title: Exploding Sun Part 2
programme.desc: A historic space launch triggers a solar-storm event that could have cataclysmic repercussions for the planet if it isn't stopped in time - and time is running out.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
programme.desc: With the nation of Panem in a full scale war, Katniss confronts President Snow in the final showdown.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in 47 Ronin, an epic fantasy where an outcast joins samurai on a quest for vengeance and honor against a ruthless overlord in ancient Japan.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood
programme.desc: Academy Award®-Nominee Sylvester Stallone stars in this explosive action-thriller that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the final, powerful frame!

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he’d want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

programme.title: Ring Of Fire Part 1
programme.desc: An oil rig triggers a volcanic eruption, kick starting a cataclysmic series along the Ring of Fire. If the eruptions aren't stopped, Earth faces an extinction-level event.

programme.title: Ring Of Fire Part 2
programme.desc: An oil rig triggers a volcanic eruption, kick starting a cataclysmic series along the Ring of Fire. If the eruptions aren't stopped, Earth faces an extinction-level event.

programme.title: Deadly 60 6
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is in Brazil searching for the world's most elusive cat: the jaguar. He sees them swimming, meets mothers and cubs, and even witnesses one jaguar hunting a caiman.

programme.title: Wild Japan 1
programme.desc: The wild Japanese island of Honshu hosts an astonishing array of wildlife, and it's a place where people and nature co-exist in the most unexpected ways.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins 1
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn 1
programme.desc: After the discovery of oil in the 1930s, the seas around Bahrain became damaged through increased shipping and spillages, and sea life was decimated. A huge engineering project was required to protect the environment and keep the trade flowing.

programme.title: Extreme Treks 4
programme.desc: The Simien Mountains is an exotic and dramatic landscape set in the northern corner of Ethiopia. Breath-taking views abound in this natural landscape inhabited by unique and endangered wildlife.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories 1
programme.desc: A lone monk is on his life's mission to recreate the tea cakes of famous sage Lu Yu from the early Tang Dynasty. In an austere nunnery near Wuhan, the nuns experience every stage of tea-making - from picking all the way through to drinking - as an act of prayerful meditation.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed 1
programme.desc: Attend a concert in a hall that soars 50 metres into the sky, then dig 30 metres underground to explore a revolutionary farm.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth 1
programme.desc: Volcan del Fuego in Guatemala is one of the most 'explosive' volcanoes of them all. To reveal what's happening within the volcano, witness the daring attempt to lower a data gathering probe inside.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life 2
programme.desc: Hannah gains access to a top-secret site where anonymous staff and the latest tech work to make the British passport one of the most secure documents on the planet.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka 1
programme.desc: Xander has a close-up encounter with a cobra, and travels north to Tamil country where he helps dig up mines remaining after the bitter civil war that raged for 30 years.

programme.title: World's Most Amazing Walks with Robson Green 1
programme.desc: Robson Green is in Austria hiking along the stunning Wachau Valley, following the incredible blue Danube.

programme.title: Elimination Game
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: A Sealed Book

programme.title: Best In Chow

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: They say big things come in small packages, and in this episode host Michael Yo discovers that big flavours can come in small dining spaces as he squeezes into a four-table pancake house in Amsterdam.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Host Michael Yo tags along as diners test their fate with a toxic pufferfish in Tokyo before biding time with a potentially poisonous pokeberry-forward multi-course menu in North Carolina.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Host Michael Yo takes us around the world to a restaurant with a bird's eye view of Singapore, as diners feast on fresh seafood fifty-seven storeys above the city.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Sometimes the best meals are kept locked behind closed doors, but in this episode host Michael Yo has the keys to some of the most special and secret dining spaces around.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Dining out takes flight into the world of fantasy when host Michael Yo shows us that make-believe experiences can be really tasty. First stop is a restaurant in New York City's Financial District.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Stephanie has dreams of being a caterer, but is humiliated by her giant baseball-sized scalp bump. Deb is afraid that the growth on the side of her knee may eventually paralyse her.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Jimmy is a firefighter whose many torso bumps make it painful to play with his young son. Tashika needs a kidney transplant, but her doctors will not do it until she gets her HS under control.

programme.title: Her Deadly Night In Paris
programme.desc: An American exchange student in Paris falls in love with her host family's handsome son. But when she witnesses a murder, it sets off a chain of events that will change the young couple's lives forever.

programme.title: One Night Stand Murder
programme.desc: A woman must fight to clear her name after she wakes up in an unfamiliar house with a dead man - and no memory of what happened. Based on true events.

programme.title: The Podcast Murders
programme.desc: A true crime podcaster tries to keep a low profile despite achieving success for her investigation of the case she calls the "Barbie Murders." But soon her anonymity isn't the only thing being threatened.

programme.title: Betrayed By Love
programme.desc: Riley March's near-perfect life comes to a sudden halt when a car accident takes her life, leaving behind a family without a mother. As the investigation commences, the case takes a strange turn.

programme.title: Theresa Caputo: Raising Spirits (S1)
programme.desc: With the power of spirit behind Theresa, her journey giving the ultimate gift of peace continues. A touching follow-up message from a podcast reading confirms Theresa's lasting impact on those in need.

programme.title: CSI S5 E23 - Iced
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.desc: Explore the latest fashion trends for teens, the cutest outfits of the A-list celebrities, mix & match insights, and style tips for all occasions.

programme.title: Wanted: Perfect Mother
programme.desc: A dashing widower named Dante (Christopher De Leon) is scouting for a tutor for his daughter, then a girl named Sam (Regine Velasquez) walks in and turned their once lonely home into a carnival.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Tinik Sa Dibdib (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a searing drama about a young woman who got married to escape from her family of parasites only to find herself in a worse situation.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Friends In Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Isla 2
programme.desc: Celso Ad Castillo once again directs with newcomer Via Veloso in the title role of Isla, the young girl who will do anything just to be able to escape her lustful adoptive father and the desolate island where she might spend her entire life.

programme.title: Anino Ni David Crusado
programme.desc: Three friends --- Macario (George Estregan), Alvaro (Conrad Poe) and David (Dante Varona) dare to lead the farmers in an uprising against the cruel reign of the Montalvos. But this is cut short as they are ambushed and left to die.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: Popular singing duo Vingo and Jimmy, collectively known as the April Boys, brought the real life tale of their climb to fame to the big screen.

programme.title: Ang Kuya Kong Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Habang Nasasaktan, Lalong Tumapatang
programme.desc: The dream of a beautiful future together by two orphans came crushing down when Mario was mistaken for a bank robber and was sent to jail.

programme.title: Tootsie Wootsie (Ang Bandang Walang Atrasan)
programme.desc: Tom, Dick and Harry were falsely accused of killing a popular radio commentator and their girlfriends, Amy, Susie and Tessie were helping them prove their innocence.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Tottori. On the Sea of Japan coast, the Tottori Sand Dunes create unique, everchanging views. Our design hunt explores a culture with deep roots in the natural world.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Entrances
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Entrances.

programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.desc: We visit the Goto Islands on Japan's western tip, meeting people with hospitality, like a couple passing on the history of hidden Christians and islanders trying to preserve their small community.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: This program is an animation series about a Japanese dog, Charo. He meets and is helped by many mythical creatures of Northern Japan as he searches for eight star talismans. Tohoku series 1-3.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: In Japan, nostalgia is spreading for the Showa era (1926-1989). We introduce electronics, retro designs, and other elements of a period that many Japanese people consider the "good old days."

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Kotaro lives in an inn in Kusatsu Onsen and shows us around the popular hot spring town. Meanwhile, Mike lives in a store in Takasaki City that sells daruma dolls. She keeps the staff company.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.desc: When a deadly secret resurfaces, five friends are stalked by a vengeful killer.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: A former extreme sports athlete is recruited by the government for a special undercover mission.

programme.title: AMERICAN NINJA WARRIOR (SEASON 15)
programme.desc: The qualifying rounds continue in L.A., with ninjas from across the country taking on the world's most challenging obstacle course. New obstacle 'The Cubes' makes its debut.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: Jake (Daniel Gillies) encourages Tess (Dolly Lewis) to talk to Superintendent Bennett (Roger Cross) about getting her old job back, but her hopes are cut short by his disappointing offer to join the Metro PD only to ride a desk.

programme.title: FBI (SEASON 6)
programme.desc: After an employee of the U.S. Army is shot in an industrial park, the team works to track down the killer who reveals a larger plot at play. Meanwhile, Tiffany continues to struggle with the guilt surrounding Hobbs' death.

programme.title: THE ROOKIE (SEASON 8)
programme.desc: John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: Danny and Lena take on a high-stakes murder case that leads to one of Boston’s most infamous unsolved crimes. Meanwhile, tensions rise within the Silver family as a complex shooting case sparks debate over accountability and parenting.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
programme.desc: When a naval officer mysteriously dies in the ‘90s, Gibbs (Austin Stowell) and the team travel to the small dust-blown town of Serenity, Calif., where they encounter secret-harboring residents, an uncooperative sheriff and an investigation that will reverberate for decades.

programme.title: I KNOW WHAT YOU DID LAST SUMMER
programme.desc: When a deadly secret resurfaces, five friends are stalked by a vengeful killer.

programme.title: THE BOURNE IDENTITY

programme.title: CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC
programme.desc: Join Cyril on a journey of self-discovery in various locations across Asia as he shares the marvels of his magic.

programme.desc: Explores strict rules, travel and epic parties of baby boomer flight crew, pilots and their passengers and discovers how women, gay men and Aboriginal Australian's struggles and triumphs in the air paved the way for a nation.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Ben Plant Hunter
programme.desc: Meet Darwin horticulturist Ben Wirth, who spends his days hunting down and collecting seeds of the unique plant species of the Northern Territory.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 24
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you today's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Yakka: Australia At Work - Soil and Toil
programme.desc: Explore how since the Second World War, Australian agriculture has had to adapt to survive in changing global and domestic economies, a volatile political landscape, and face the challenges of an unpredictable climate.

programme.title: Great Australian Road Trips - Episode 4

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Arthur Shawcross tells a lot of stories about his life before he began to kill. He might have been known for killing women along Rochester's Genesee River, but his first murder was years earlier.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: A young, pregnant woman is found dead of an apparent suicide in Saginaw, MI, but her family and friends don't believe it. The police discover a shocking secret they never saw coming.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: An elderly woman gets arrested for domestic battery after fighting with her sister. Meanwhile in Virginia Beach, a 19-year-old boy gets extradited from Miami after missing his court date.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: African-American women in the Mt Pleasant neighbourhood of Cleveland were vanishing. Their families cried for help, but no one knew what was happening. No one except Anthony Sowell.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A convicted quadruple murderer argues with the judge; a pastor who stole from his church hears it from a member of his congregation; a man who murdered his grandparents becomes disorderly in the courtroom.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A judge lashes out at a defence attorney who refers to his drunk driving client as a hero; a religious leader convicted of sexually abusing minors hears it from his victims; and more.

programme.desc: When a Tulsa father of two is shot just blocks from his ex-girlfriend's house, detectives have to decide which of two persons of interest should be charged with his murder.

programme.desc: For nearly a year, investigators from multiple law enforcement agencies work tirelessly to uncover a twisted tale of secrets and lies that led to murder.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)

programme.desc: An elderly woman gets arrested for domestic battery after fighting with her sister. Meanwhile in Virginia Beach, a 19-year-old boy gets extradited from Miami after missing his court date.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: African-American women in the Mt Pleasant neighbourhood of Cleveland were vanishing. Their families cried for help, but no one knew what was happening. No one except Anthony Sowell.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: For nearly a year, investigators from multiple law enforcement agencies work tirelessly to uncover a twisted tale of secrets and lies that led to murder.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: During a routine undercover prostitution sting, Columbus Vice Detective Andrew Mitchell shoots and kills 23-year-old Donna Dalton Castleberry.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: Tulsa police find a woman beaten to death during a welfare check, and a son witnesses his father's murder while renovating a house.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A convicted quadruple murderer argues with the judge; a pastor who stole from his church hears it from a member of his congregation; a man who murdered his grandparents becomes disorderly in the courtroom.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A judge lashes out at a defence attorney who refers to his drunk driving client as a hero; a religious leader convicted of sexually abusing minors hears it from his victims; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa father of two is shot just blocks from his ex-girlfriend's house, detectives have to decide which of two persons of interest should be charged with his murder.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: Kindergarten

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 3 English

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science

programme.title: Grade 8 Math

programme.title: Grade 8 English

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: Know more about the volcanoes found in the Philippines, the factors that affect climate, the effects of changing climate, and how to adapt accordingly. Discover the relationship between the constellations in the sky and Earth's position along its orbit.

programme.title: Les Maîtres Du Tofu
programme.desc: The tofu has made a recent appearance on Western plates. Neutral in taste, it is eaten seasoned, cooked, raw, as a dish, as a side, as a dessert... A journey from China to Japan and Vietnam, through soybean fields, production workshops and traditional markets, to discover tofu.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: An in-depth look at an extraordinary jeweller: the story of Tournaire. All about eating lobster. A sculptural style with a hint of the industrial: an immersive visit to Victoria Wilmotte's studio. suit or oversized suit, shirt and tie: the tailored look is riding high.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Lyon, the Musée des Beaux-Arts houses 90,000 works of art. Lucille Boitelle is an ornamental painter who creates worlds that embellish any surface. Sensual and ethereal: the show by Uruguayan designer Gabriela Hearst. In Douarnenez, ceramist Mathieu Casseau handles clay with vigour and gentleness.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Savourer
programme.desc: On the menu: beef with broccoli, bruschetta burger, fried cod with Mexican salsa sauce, polenta with Italian sausages, strawberry and basil crumble.

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France
programme.desc: Once he's lifted all his pots, it's time for Stéphane to head back to port and unload his catch. But for this fisherman, making the most of life also includes passing on the tradition of fishing for snow crabs, one that dates back three centuries, to his sons.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Boss
programme.desc: Welcome to the first pan-African competition dedicated to entrepreneurs! Four emblematic mentors are travelling across French-speaking Africa to identify the entrepreneurs who will drive the economy of tomorrow. Sixteen candidates will be selected to join the Station; ten of them will face a panel of investors in the grand final.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi

programme.title: À Qui Profite Le Doute ?
programme.desc: The body of a drug dealer is found in the port of Marseille. All signs point to his murder by Sybille Varlet, the daughter of a famous shipowner, who used to buy drugs from him. Determined to save her daughter, Véra Varlet calls for help from her ex-partner, former commissioner Costello.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Lyon, the Musée des Beaux-Arts houses 90,000 works of art. Lucille Boitelle is an ornamental painter who creates worlds that embellish any surface. Sensual and ethereal: the show by Uruguayan designer Gabriela Hearst. In Douarnenez, ceramist Mathieu Casseau handles clay with vigour and gentleness.

programme.title: Anti-Squat
programme.desc: Inès is bringing up her teenage son alone and is threatened with eviction. In search of a steady job, she is hired at Anti-squat, which houses people in unoccupied offices to keep squatters away. Her role is to recruit residents, keep an eye on them and enforce strict rules.

programme.title: Donovan S'Évade
programme.desc: Donovan, a bodyguard, is given the job of protecting the wife of a government minister, on holiday with friends. In doing so the young man discovers a life to which he has never been entitled.

programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, Émilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Métiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ça
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triplés
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.desc: French football championship. Orange Vélodrome (Marseille). 1st half-time.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Overtourism coexists here with a heroic form of agriculture, rooted in steep landscapes where machines have no place. Between the Alps and the Mediterranean, with terraced crops on sheer cliffs, paradisiacal seaside settings and winding roads, Liguria offers a sumptuous yet difficult territory to travel through.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: After the Science Scouts begin selling biscuits to fund a trip to Mars, Mr. Krabs joins the ring and turns it into a competition. // When a competitor threatens to shut down Mrs. Puff's boating school, she must rely on SpongeBob to stay in business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Tired of doing grunt work at the Krusty Krab, Squidward takes a new job as Manager of Weenie Hut Jr's. // Squidward gets trapped in an elevator with SpongeBob and Patrick on his way to return a nearly overdue library book.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Granny Tentacles helps Squidward collect his paper delivery money from Cecil. // The Star family house runs away from home.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick's uncontrollable drooling gets out of hand and mouth. // A shape-shifting alien runs loose in the Star home.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin books the band at a birthday party only to discover they've been booked for the petting zoo, as the pets! // When Alvin tries to break Theodore's dependence on Talking Teddy, Theodore invents a new imaginary friend.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Simon falls ill, Alvin takes his place on a camping trip only to discover it's actually an archeological dig. // The Chipmunks don't know what to do when they suspect Dave is lying about the various awards he's won.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carlos has to choose Carlitos' Padrino in time for his Christening, but will he make the right call? // Carlota needs a PE credit in order to graduate, so she and Ronnie Anne set out to find the right sport for her.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: With Cherry working at Splat by Sea, Max ropes her into a fake dating scheme to score partner discounts at the restaurant. Chloe faces a tough choice between winning a trivia competition or supporting her brother Billy when he wants to join her team.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After Chloe's birthday party is cancelled, Max and Phoebe compete to throw her a new one. When Max's time-stopping birthday gift falls into the wrong hands, he must work with Phoebe to stop some party poopers from ruining Chloe's birthday.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Captain Man makes twin superheroes, ShoutOut and AWOL, compete over who can catch more criminals using their own ways of crime-fighting.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Mika tries too hard to win Man's Nest Employee of The Month, she creates a monster that could ruin the telethon Danger Force is hosting.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Charlotte is challenged to a fight at school, Captain Man and Kid Danger step in to try and help Charlotte defend herself.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When a report comes out that Kid Danger's super power is actually an illness, Kid Danger has to convince Swellview that it is a huge misunderstanding.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Ninja Turtles are on the run and...alone. Leonardo is a leader but who is he without anyone to lead? Leo now has to stop Bishop and her Mechazoids while trying to save his brothers.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: To save his brothers, Mikey needs the help of Bishop's intern, ROD. But Rod wants something in return... to be turned into a MUTANT! To save the day, Mikey has to become... RESPONSIBLE.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack gets his first phone and immediately sends the wrong text to Will, forcing the kids to do whatever it takes to delete it. // When the last hallasand goes missing, fingers point to Halmoni and only a family tribunal will set the record straight.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The Groom & Board gets a surprise inspection, but the broken pipe Jack and Lil neglected to fix might ruin them all. // Chuck's got a new hustle: theatre camp! Jack & Lil are sure it's a scam. But there's more to the chaotic show than they realized.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick create their own zoo made entirely of bubbles! // The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton needs help stealing the formula, so he hires an intern who knows more about Mr. Krabs than anyone. // Patrick goes into a destructive fit whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Bubble Bass avoids paying his bill at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob and Squidward are sent to collect the cash. // Mr. Krabs makes Spongebob and Squidward cook a fancy meal for Mrs. Puff, but every dish becomes a dispute.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe is struggling with her leadership skills, but when a villain attacks her school field trip, Max and Phoebe have to put Chloe in charge while they try to take down the villain and defuse his dangerous astronomical weapon.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Missing fame and fans, Max decides to recapture some glory by breaking Booch's sandwich-stacking record at Splat by the Sea, but Chloe challenges him so that her friend can have her record back.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Things get a little buggy when Schwoz installs a new operating system on the Man Cave Computer designed to detect and eliminate threats all over Swellview.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: The kids stumble upon a door they have never seen before in the Man's Nest and are determined to see what's behind it despite Ray telling them it's off limits. However, once they get inside, they must deal with the dangerous and bizarre consequences.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie urge the iCarly fans to vote David Archuleta to victory on America Sings, they feel bad for the runner-up and help him make a music video. Meanwhile, Sam teaches Spencer how to lie like a pro.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam admits she has a crush on a boy at school, Carly teaches Sam how to entice him by acting more girly. Meanwhile, Spencer is convinced that a girl likes him because of his tuxedo, so he starts wearing it all the time.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: After Tori fills in for her ailing sister in a big musical showcase, Tori is asked to enroll at an elite performing arts high school. But once there, Tori struggles to fit in to her new surroundings.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam notices that Cat has been spending lots of money. When she asks where it's coming from, Cat takes Sam to a "Magic ATM" that gives her free money. Sam worries that this might not be legal.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When Leo accidentally saves a subway station full of innocent people, he's inspired to take on a life of crime-fighting vigilantism as the Night Ninja! But has he met his match with the villainous La Fleur and her gang of dognappers?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The villainous, dog-hating madman known as SCRATCH holds the city's dogs hostage! His only demand? For the Night Ninja to surrender! But Leo, April and the Turtles realize there's more to Scratch than meets the eye.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob hides the secret formula in his home, it’s up to Gary to protect it from Plankton. // When a freak accident causes everyone in town to become as stupid as Patrick, Sandy must save the day.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When a storm sweeps the Krusty Krab away, its crew and customers will need a crazed Krabs to lead them back home. // Patrick’s last baby tooth needs to come out, but he’s afraid to let it go.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing at the Dry Cleaners. // In an unfortunate case of mistaken identity, Best has been mistaken for the notorious jewel thief, Jimmy Muggins.

programme.title: Best and Bester

programme.title: Best and Bester

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.desc: It's a battle of the wits between Donnie and Bishop as he races through NYC's subway system to stop her evil Mechazoids. But how do you beat an AI that counters your every move?
